QueryResult.text: select prtimeperiod.prid odf_pk, PRTIMEPERIOD.PRID as time_period_key, PRTIMEPERIOD.PRID as clarity_time_period_key, CMN_DATE_TRUNC_FCT( PRTIMEPERIOD.PRSTART ) as start_date, COP_CALC_FINISH_FCT( PRTIMEPERIOD.PRFINISH ) as finish_date, prtimeperiod.prisopen as is_active, prtimeperiod.prmodtime as clarity_updated_date from prtimeperiod prtimeperiod where 1 = 1
